about_the_game:
Swarms

Creepy Crawly Critters

SWARMS is a beautiful bestiary for the 
Pathfinder Roleplaying Game  featuring 80 spectacular swarms of killer creatures perfect for your campaign! Within these pages, you'll find clouds and carpets of spiders and centipedes, wasps and snakes, including common vermin and monstrous variants like the vampire bat swarm and horribulous rat swarm. This creature collection also features tons of all-new swarms from the elemental
gravelbugs  and 
living wildfire  to the sinister
dead ink swarm, unquiet ash,  and 
nettler demons;  weirdness like the 
swarm of wonder, fairy rings, hexagnomes, neutron starlings,  and 
whispering heralds;  and whimsical challenges like 
animated silverware, finger-crushing lobsters, hungry penguins , and the 

floofy kitten swarm
! These monsters are beautifully illustrated and feature creatures from aberrations to dragons and fey to undead ranging from CR 1/4 to 21, so you'll always have a swarm perfect for your PCs no matter their level!
This book is the latest awesome addition to our 
Legendary Bestiary  series, featuring spectacular softcovers like 


Asian Monsters, Latin American Monsters, Mechanical Monsters, Mediterranean Monsters, Mythos Monsters , 
and 


Sea Monsters

, as well as the massive hardcover 


Alien Bestiary 

and 


Faerie Bestiary ! These bestiary books are available in 
PDF and print as well as your favorite VTT! Check out this product adapted from the amazing 90-page bestiary for the
Pathfinder Roleplaying Game  and Make Your Game Legendary!
"
